text: The Door () is a 2009 German science fiction thriller film directed by Anno Saul and starring Mads Mikkelsen and Jessica Schwarz. ==Plot== An artist who, after losing his daughter, discovers a mysterious doorway leading to the past.First Trailer For German Thriller THE DOOR With Mads Mikkelsen - ScreenAnarchyDVD Review – The Door (2009)Anno Saul == Cast == == References == == External links == * Category:German films Category:German science fiction thriller films Category:2009 films Category:2000s science fiction thriller films
title: The Door (2009 film)
